metadata.title: CVE-2022-49012 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:afs: Fix server->active leak in afs_put_serverThe atomic_read was accidentally replaced with atomic_inc_return,which prevents the server from getting cleaned up and causes rmmodto hang with a warning:    Can't purge s=00000001

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
